original_title: Os 20 Centavos Que Elegeram Jair Bolsonaro
overview: The victory of Jair Messias Bolsonaro in the 2018 brazilian general election raised a series of doubts in the minds of many Brazilians: Where did he come from? How did he manage to gain so many followers in such a short time? Why were the media and art class so afraid of his candidacy? And how did he win the 2018 elections?
title: The 20 Cents That Elected Jair Bolsonaro
